Trying to eat less fat and more food that helps build strength

Since you calorie intake so far today is between 500 and 750, we recommend that you eat some type of vegetable dish. Maybe eat some eggplant since it will help you develop strength and has a lot of nutrients that you need.
Recipe Idea: Eggplant Fries
Ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 tsp carom seeds, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper powder, and a pinch of asafoetida, 5mm raw eggplant slices\n

Process: Mix the dry ingredients (everything besides the eggplant pieces) well. Add cold water and make sure no lumps are formed. The batter should have the the same consistency as pancake batter. Dip the eggplant pieces into the batter and deep fry in hot oil. Reduce the heat after the eggplant pieces are dropped in oil and fry until they are a beige-ish color. Then remove them and place them on a paper towel to drain excess oil. You can eat them plain, or with ketchup or pulverized cilantro.
